measure.name: Successful Agent Uploads Ratio
measure.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'AGENT_UPLOAD_STARTED' AND SOURCE_NODE = '$NODE$';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'AGENT_UPLOAD_SUCCESS' AND SOURCE_NODE = '$NODE$';

measure.name: Type of Agent A
measure.query: SELECT TYPE FROM AGENT WHERE AGENT_ID = -6882384308892167869;

measure.name: Send Messages over Time (Node)
measure.query: SELECT CAST(FROM_UNIXTIME(TIME_STAMP/1000) AS CHAR) AS Time, COUNT(EVENT) AS 'Send Messages' FROM MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'MESSAGE_SENDING' AND SOURCE_NODE = '$NODE$' GROUP BY TIME_STAMP;

measure.name: Send Messages over Time (Service)
measure.query: SELECT CAST(FROM_UNIXTIME(TIME_STAMP/1000) AS CHAR) AS Time, COUNT(EVENT) AS 'Send Messages' FROM MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'MESSAGE_SENDING' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' GROUP BY TIME_STAMP;

measure.name: Number of private Chatrooms over Time
Number of public Chatrooms over Time
Send Messages over Time
measure.query: SELECT CAST(FROM_UNIXTIME(TIME_STAMP/1000) AS CHAR) AS Time, COUNT(*) AS 'Send Messages' FROM MESSAGE WHERE (EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_2' OR EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_1') AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' GROUP BY TIME_STAMP;

measure.name: Received Messages over Time
measure.query: SELECT CAST(FROM_UNIXTIME(TIME_STAMP/1000) AS CHAR) AS Time, COUNT(*) AS 'Received Messages' FROM MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_7' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' GROUP BY TIME_STAMP;

measure.name: Average Users per private Chatroom
measure.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS Number FROM MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_3' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$'

SELECT COUNT(privateJoins.PrivateJoins) AS UniqueJoins FROM (SELECT joins.uniqueJoins AS PrivateJoins FROM MESSAGE, ((SELECT COUNT(DESTINATION_AGENT) AS uniqueJoins, REMARKS FROM MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_8' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' GROUP BY DESTINATION_AGENT, REMARKS) joins) WHERE joins.REMARKS = MESSAGE.REMARKS AND MESSAGE.EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_3') privateJoins

measure.name: Average Users per public Chatroom
measure.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS Number FROM MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_4' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$'

SELECT COUNT(publicJoins.PublicJoins) AS UniqueJoins FROM (SELECT joins.uniqueJoins AS PublicJoins FROM MESSAGE, ((SELECT COUNT(DESTINATION_AGENT) AS uniqueJoins, REMARKS FROM MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_8' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' GROUP BY DESTINATION_AGENT, REMARKS) joins) WHERE joins.REMARKS = MESSAGE.REMARKS AND MESSAGE.EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_4') publicJoins

measure.name: Average Messages send per User
measure.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS UserCount FROM (SELECT DESTINATION_AGENT AS AllUsers FROM MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_8' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' GROUP BY DESTINATION_AGENT) allUsers
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_1' OR EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_2' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$'

measure.name: Average Messages received per User
measure.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS UserCount FROM (SELECT DESTINATION_AGENT AS AllUsers FROM MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_8' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' GROUP BY DESTINATION_AGENT) allUsers
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_7' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$'

measure.name: Average Time to fetch Chatroom Information in Milliseconds
measure.query: SELECT AVG(timeToFetch.difference) AS AverageTime FROM (SELECT (m2.TIME_STAMP - m.TIME_STAMP) AS difference FROM MESSAGE m, MESSAGE m2 WHERE m.EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_5' AND m2.EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_6' AND m.REMARKS=m2.REMARKS AND m.SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' AND m2.SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$') timeToFetch

measure.name: Average Time to send Message in Milliseconds
measure.query: SELECT AVG(timeToSend.difference) AS AverageTime FROM (SELECT (m2.TIME_STAMP - m.TIME_STAMP) AS difference FROM MESSAGE m, MESSAGE m2 WHERE (m.EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_1' OR m.EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_2') AND m2.EVENT = 'MESSAGE_RECEIVED_ANSWER' AND m.REMARKS=m2.REMARKS AND m.SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$') timeToSend

measure.name: Average Time spend in Chatroom in Seconds
measure.query: SELECT AVG(timeSpend.difference)/1000 AS AverageTime FROM (SELECT (m2.TIME_STAMP - m.TIME_STAMP) AS difference FROM MESSAGE m, MESSAGE m2 WHERE m.EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_8' AND m2.EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_9' AND m.REMARKS = m2.REMARKS AND m.ID < m2.ID AND m.SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' AND m2.SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' GROUP BY m.ID) timeSpend
